LanguageData.R_AteTukudani.stages.0.label: Ate caramelized insects

LanguageData.R_CurryRice.stages.0.label: Ate the best curry and rice
LanguageData.R_CurryRice.stages.0.description: It is so luxurious enjoying different tastes every day by changing ingredients or methods.
LanguageData.R_SeasoningDebuff.stages.0.label: Ate raw seasoning
LanguageData.R_SeasoningDebuff.stages.0.description: Seasonings is for cooking only. Nothing can express my sadness.
